mapper.select:
select TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ENABLED , TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMDES , TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMID , TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ITEMDES
from TP_CGAUTHORITY WHERE 1=1 AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMDES IS NOT NULL AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMID IS NOT NULL
AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ENABLED like '' || #{cEnabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''
AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ITEMDES like '' || #{cItemdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''

select TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CHECKWAY , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_TRANSWAY , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CLUDECOM , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CLUDETIME , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONLINE , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONMONEY , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONNUM , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CREATER , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CREATETIME , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_FORINLAND , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_GETTIME , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_ID , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_MODIFIER , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_MODIFYTIME , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_ORMTID , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_ORSTID, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_PAYWAY , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_REMARK , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_STATE , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SUPPLIER , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_TIMESTAMP , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CLUDEADDR , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_DR , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_FOROUTLAND , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW09 , TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW10, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW11, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW12, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_DR, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SIGNSTEP
from TP_CGCONTRACTMT WHERE 1=1 AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SIGNSTEP = '0'
AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONLINE like '%' || #{cgH004M1s1.cConline,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONNUM like '%' || #{cgH004M1s1.cConnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CREATETIME like '%' || #{cgH004M1s1.cCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} || '%'
AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_STATE like '%' || #{cgH004M1s1.cState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SUPPLIER like '%' || #{cgH004M1s1.cSupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW10 like '%' || #{cgH004M1s1.cSw10,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

select TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_STATE , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_SUPPLIER , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_BEFOREARREX , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_ARRIVALNUM , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_TIMESTAMP , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_BEFOREARRTIME , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_CONLINE , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_CONMTID , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_CONNUM , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_CONSTID , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_CREATER , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_CREATETIME , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_DAYS , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_DELADDR , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_DELTIME , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_DR , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_GETTIME , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_GOODSCLECK , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_ID , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_MODIFIER , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_MODIFYTIME , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_ORMAN , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_SW01 , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_SW02 , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_SW03 , TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_REMARK
from TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK WHERE 1=1
AND TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_CONLINE like '' || #{cgH004S2s3.cConline,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''
AND TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK.C_CONNUM like '' || #{cgH004S2s3.cConnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''

update.foreach:
update TP_CGRECEIVEBOOK
C_SW01 = #{item.cSw01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_SW02 = #{item.cSw02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_SW03 = #{item.cSw03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_STATE = #{item.cState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_MODIFIER = #{item.cModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_MODIFYTIME = #{item.cModifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_SUPPLIER = #{item.cSupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_BEFOREARREX = #{item.cBeforearrex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ARRIVALNUM = #{item.cArrivalnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIMESTAMP = #{item.cTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_CONLINE = #{item.cConline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CONMTID = #{item.cConmtid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CONNUM = #{item.cConnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CONSTID = #{item.cConstid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_DAYS = #{item.cDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_DELADDR = #{item.cDeladdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_DELTIME = #{item.cDeltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_GETTIME = #{item.cGettime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_GOODSCLECK = #{item.cGoodscleck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ID = #{item.cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ORMAN = #{item.cOrman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_REMARK = #{item.cRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE C_ID = #{item.cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
